overview: Derren Brown uses his skills on selected participants who answered an advertisement. Under the guise of attending a 'motivational seminar', Derren recruits a number of participants, eventually manipulating a number of them into robbing a security van in broad daylight. 'The Heist' has been described by Derren as one of the stunts of which he is most proud.
title: Derren Brown: The Heist
